text:
Company: Silva, Griffin and Lopez

Role: Intergovernmental Affairs Intern

Company Background:
Silva, Griffin and Lopez is a premier consulting firm specializing in intergovernmental affairs, public policy advising, and strategic communications. We pride ourselves on our commitment to creating inclusive and diverse work environments where every team member can thrive.

Job Type:
Internship

Job Description:
We are seeking a motivated Intergovernmental Affairs Intern to join our dynamic team. This internship offers an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience in public policy, governmental relations, and strategic communications. The ideal candidate will have a strong interest in government affairs and policy development.

Responsibilities:
- Assisting in the research and analysis of policy issues.
- Supporting the preparation of reports, briefs, and presentations.
- Attending and summarizing key meetings and events.
- Helping coordinate intergovernmental initiatives and outreach programs.
- Assisting with project management and administrative tasks as necessary.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in political science, public policy, or a related field.
- Excellent research, writing, and analytical skills.
- Strong organizational and time management abilities.
- Effective communication skills, both written and verbal.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).

Perks and Benefits:
- Comprehensive orientation and training program.
- Mentorship and professional development opportunities.
- Flexible working hours to accommodate academic schedules.
- Stipend of USD 1,500 per month.
- Access to networking events and professional industry seminars.

Equal Opportunity Statement:
At Silva, Griffin and Lopez, we are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. We support a work environment that accommodates all. All candidates will be considered based on merit. We offer a supportive work environment for all and seek to build a diverse and talented team. We create opportunities for candidates of all abilities.

Application Instructions:
Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and a cover letter outlining their interest and qualifications for the role to careers@silvagriffinlopez.com. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis.
